name: Aegis
description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds, all party members within earshot have a 50% chance to block attacks.

name: Aegis (PvP)
description: Enchantment Spell. For 1...3...3 seconds, target other party member cannot be the target of hostile spells, and attacks against this party member fail.

name: Balthazar's Aura
description: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, foes adjacent to target ally take 10...22...25 holy damage each second.

name: Bane Signet
description: Signet. Target foe takes 26...50...56 holy damage. If target foe was attacking, that foe is knocked down.

name: Banish
description: Spell. Target foe takes 20...49...56 holy damage. This spell does double damage to summoned creatures.

name: Blessed Signet
description: Signet. For each enchantment you are maintaining, you gain 3 Energy. You cannot gain more than 3...20...24 Energy in this way.

name: Convert Hexes
description: Spell. Remove all hexes from target other ally. For 8...18...20 seconds, that ally gains +10 armor for each Necromancer hex that was removed.

name: Divine Boon
description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever you cast a Protection Prayer [sic] or Divine Favor spell that targets an ally, that ally is healed for 15...51...60 Health, and you lose 1 Energy.

name: Divine Intervention
description: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, the next time target ally receives damage that would be fatal, the damage is negated and that ally is healed for 26...197...240 Health.

name: Draw Conditions
description: Spell. All negative conditions are transferred from target other ally to yourself. For each condition acquired, you gain 6...22...26 Health.

name: Guardian
description: Enchantment Spell. For 2...6...7 seconds, target ally has a 50% chance to block attacks.

name: Heal Party
description: Spell. Heal entire party for 30...66...75 Health.

name: Heal Party (PvP)
description: Spell. Heal entire party for 30...66...75 Health.

name: Healing Breeze
description: Enchantment Spell. For 15 seconds, target ally gains +4...8...9 Health regeneration.

name: Healing Seed
description: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target other ally takes damage, that ally and all adjacent allies gain 3...25...30 Health.

name: Healing Touch
description: Spell. Heal target touched ally for 16...51...60 Health. Health gain from Divine Favor is doubled for this spell.

name: Holy Veil
description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, any hex cast on target ally takes twice as long to cast. When Holy Veil ends, one hex is removed from target ally.

name: Infuse Health
description: Spell. Lose half your current Health. Target other ally is healed for 100...129...136% of the amount you lost.

name: Judge's Insight
description: Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target ally's attacks deal holy damage and have +20% armor penetration.

name: Judgment Strike
description: Elite Melee Attack. Attack target and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +13...27...30 Holy damage [sic] and knocks down attacking foes. PvE Skill

name: Life Bond
description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target other ally takes damage from an attack, half the damage is redirected to you. The damage you receive this way is reduced by 3...25...30.

name: Martyr
description: Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions and their remaining durations from your allies to you.

name: Mend Ailment
description: Spell. Remove one condition (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, or Deep Wound) from target ally. For each remaining Condition, that ally is healed for 5...57...70 Health.

name: Mending
description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains +1...3...4 Health regeneration.

name: Orison of Healing
description: Spell. Heal target ally for 20...60...70 Health.

name: Protective Spirit
description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...19...23 seconds, target ally cannot lose more than 10% max Health due to damage from a single attack or spell.

name: Purge Conditions
description: Spell. Remove all conditions (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, and Deep Wound) from target ally.

name: Purge Signet
description: Signet. Remove all hexes and conditions from target ally. You lose 10 Energy for each hex and each condition removed.

name: Rebirth
description: Spell. Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy, and is teleported to your current location. All of target's skills are disabled for 10...4...3 seconds. This spell consumes all of your remaining Energy.

name: Remove Hex
description: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally.

name: Resurrect
description: Spell. Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.

name: Retribution
description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 33% of the damage back to the source (maximum 5...17...20 damage).

name: Reversal of Fortune
description: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead, maximum 15...67...80.

name: Scourge Healing
description: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 15...67...80 holy damage.

name: Shield of Regeneration
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...11...13 seconds, target ally gains +3...9...10 Health regeneration and 40 armor.

name: Shielding Hands
description: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, damage and life steal received by target ally is reduced by 3...15...18. When Shielding Hands ends, that ally is healed for 5...41...50 Health.

name: Signet of Devotion
description: Signet. Heal target ally for 14...83...100 Health.

name: Signet of Judgment
description: Elite Signet. Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take 15...63...75 holy damage.

name: Signet of Judgment (PvP)
description: Elite Signet. Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take 5...41...50 holy damage. This signet has half the normal range.

name: Smite Hex
description: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes in the area suffer 10...70...85 holy damage.

name: Spell Breaker
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...15...17 seconds, target ally cannot be the target of enemy spells.

name: Strength of Honor
description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 5...21...25 more damage in melee.

name: Strength of Honor (PvP)
description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 1...4...5 more damage in melee.

name: Word of Healing
description: Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 5...81...100 Health. Heal for an additional 30...98...115 Health if that ally is below 50% Health.

name: Zealot's Fire
description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, whenever you use a skill that targets an ally, all foes adjacent to that target are struck for 5...29...35 fire damage and you lose 1 Energy.
